concept.title: HTML Layout Pages
concept.shortdesc: HTML Layout Pages represent an important component involved by the WebHelp generation process. They are simple HTML templates defining the layout of the generated pages.

conbody.p: Each of the HTML Layout Page contain one or more template components (such as title, table of contents, search input, etc.) whose placement inside the template will define the final layout of the output.
This mechanism allows you to create multiple layouts simply by creating templates that define the location of where the various components will be displayed.
